transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good evening, sir.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Mam.
Executive: Sir, main Anju baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataye mam.
Executive: Haanji sir. Sir actually service ke regarding aap se discussion karna tha. Main abhi check kar rahi thi aapne leads vagera consume nahi kar rahe.
Customer: Madam koi hamare isme aaye bhi to matlab dekhe ki isme kya matlab wo kahi dur dur ke rehti hai usme hum kya karenge isme.
Executive: Sir maine aapke paas fact se pehle leads share ki thi. Aapka 13 number hai na? Sabka primary number hai.
Executive: To maine leads share ki thi.
Customer: dekh lete hai thoda bhi me dekha tha humne. Dekh lete hai jab koi paas ki ho matlab to hum usko dekhe bhi usme. Dur dur rehti hai usme.
Executive: Dekhiye sir leads aapke paas aa rahi hai uske liye aapko thoda sa active rehna padega.
Executive: Sir.
Executive: Leads hai but aap usko dekhiye agar main abhi baat karu.
Executive: Ek second main aapko dikha deti hu.
Executive: Jaise aapko Lalganj ki thi right? Lalganj iske near by isme.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji aawaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Yaar printer ki dene ko na.
Customer: Ek to phone bhi.
Executive: Aa rahi hai sir aawaz?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible] wala nahi chala aage se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not consuming the leads.

Resolution:

- Executive shared leads with the customer.
- Executive asked the customer to be active.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, service, active
